nodes.body: Azure Pipelines successfully started running 1 pipeline(s).

Ah interesting, since the SDK now requires 17.8 we have to wait until that ships and is available to our official and PR build machines. @marcpopMSFT, did the policy on that change? I expected 8.0.100 GA to require 17.7.

> Ah interesting, since the SDK now requires 17.8 we have to wait until that ships and is available to our official and PR build machines. @marcpopMSFT, did the policy on that change? I expected 8.0.100 GA to require 17.7.

The GA requires 17.7 to target 7 and below. We've always required the matching VS version to target the releasing runtime. See this super confusing table for more details: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/core/porting/versioning-sdk-msbuild-vs#targeting-and-support-rules
